summary.Title: Driver for Lorry/Lastbil
summary.Presentation:
Transport med Sjæl A/S is looking driver for Lorry/Lastbil in Copenhagen/Sjælland/ Jylland
Do you want to try your hand at various truck work in one of Denmark's best truck

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Transport med Sjæl A/S is looking driver for Lorry/Lastbil in Copenhagen/Sjælland/ Jylland

Do you want to try your hand at various truck work in one of Denmark's best truck service companies? Are you stable, committed and ready to take on the challenge? So maybe you are the one we are looking for?

 

About us:

We are a company that always has something to do and that works when customers need us. Therefore, it is important that you are reliable, strong-willed and dare to take initiative and responsibility for your actions. Most of the work takes place in Denmark, and right now we are looking for one or two truck drivers to drive regularly for a couple of our big customers within København/Sjælland/Jylland.

 

Job Responsibility:

• Performs various transport tasks, assesses the job on site and performs the task safely and efficiently in collaboration with the customer.

• Comply with safety rules (we take safety seriously – no ninja stunts on the job!) -

• Clean and take care of minor repairs on the truck

• Provide good and professional customer service (we love happy customers!).

 

Qualifications:

• You can both work independently and collaborate in teams.

• You are flexible regarding working hours (we work when customers need us, so no strict 8-16 here).

• You have a driving license for C/CE

• You have a minimum of 1-2 years of experience with truck/trailer driving

• You have an EU driver's license/if you have a 3rd country driving license, you must exchange it within 6 months with lessons.

• Forklift certificate is an advantage

• You must speak English whereas Danish and other Scandinavian languages ​​will be an advantage

We offer: An exciting job with lots of challenges, freedom under responsibility and an informal atmosphere. With us, you get good employment conditions, including a pension scheme, health insurance and an active staff union.

If you are interested in becoming part of a dynamic company with a strong focus on the employee, press the button "apply for the position" or send your application directly with your CV to admin@tms-transport.dk

Transport med Sjæl A/S is Denmark's leading supplier of crane services, and in addition we also have significant activities within truck lifts, tipping and transport.

 

Read more about Transport med Sjæl A/S at www.tms-transport.dk
